snippet: Israel dismissed its deputy ambassador to Washington over allegations that he leaked top-secret information to an Israeli journalist, a Foreign Ministry spokeswoman said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Israel dismissed its deputy ambassador to Washington over allegations that he leaked top-secret information to an Israeli journalist, a Foreign Ministry spokeswoman said Wednesday.

headline.main: Israel: Envoy to Washington Fired Over Leak to a Newspaper
headline.print_headline: Israel: Envoy to Washington Fired Over Leak to a Newspaper
